* I\'ve temporarily removed the file due to trouble getting the Dawnguard quest to start when entering Dayspring Canyon

INTRODUCTION:

Have you ever played Skyrim with Dawnguard just for the mods that require it? Are you tired of vampires attacking the cities when you aren\'t even playing the questline? If so, then this mod is for you! 




FUNCTION:

What this mod does is delay the beginning of the Dawnguard questline and random vampire encounters/attacks until after the main questline is finished. Now you may ask: \"but what if I want to play the DLC with one of my characters before finishing the main story?!?\". Don\'t worry! All you have to do to bypass this is go to Dayspring Canyon and start the quest manually like you would if you were below level 10 - this will start the storyline and the random encounters as normal.

Another question you may have is: \"Why did you delay Dawnguard to after the main storyline?\" Well, personally I\'ve always felt that the DLC was inherently meant to be played after the main questline, especially with the overlap that pretty much requires you to play through 80% of the main quest just to continue through Dawnguard. I also find it fairly annoying to have to deal with all of the attacks until you finish the DLC. That being said, there are also a lot of popular mods that require Dawnguard to work, so this will allow you to use those files without worrying about the storyline. If there are any errors please let me know immediately and I will see what I can do.




REQUIREMENTS:

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Dawnguard
The last patch update by Bethesda




COMPATIBILITY:
If you are using the Dawnguard version of \"The Choice is Yours\", you will want to put this mod after it if you don\'t want to hear the guards or Durak talk about the Dawnguard. Otherwise, you will go with his iteration of delaying the game. The vampire attacks will be delayed the same way in both cases




INSTALLATION:

Simply download with Nexus Mod Manager or extract the file into the Skyrim data folder

Please keep in mind that if you already have the marker to go to Dayspring canyon then this mod will not disable the quest, but the random encounters should be stopped until you meet Isran


UNINSTALLATION:

Simply disable the mod in NMM and the quests will automatically begin if you are over level 10
